Changelog
---------

0.4.1 (2013-09-30)
------------------

- Add test suite validation and skip running test suites without test cases
  [Asko Soukka]

0.4.0 (2013-09-29)
------------------

- Add support for overriding robot variables using ROBOT_-prefixed environment
  variables [Asko Soukka]

0.3.1 (2013-09-21)
------------------

- Fix issue in Sphinx's image processing after test has been run
  [Asko Soukka]
